## 3324 63rd Ave E, Bradenton, Florida 34203 \| 941-727-0177 \| 941-727-0178 fax

## ​

## Recycling Solutions Provider for Central West Florida

## ​

## Monday - Friday 8am - 5 pm (last load 4:50pm)

## Saturday 8am-2pm (last load 1:50pm)

###### A division of Kingfish Holding Corporation, a Delaware corporation

- [Home](https://www.renovoresourcesolutions.com/)

- More


Use tab to navigate through the menu items.

We are often asked about the classification of materials so we wanted to provide a quick guide for grading your material and what to expect.  This list is not all inclusive and you will find that there are many similarities in how scrap yards grade their material.  In order to maximize your profits the best rule of thumb is separate your materials by material type.  Below you will find general descriptions with photos to help you to identify your material.

​

We hope this helps and look forward seeing you.  Come discover the Renovo Difference!

metadata.twitter:description: Here you will find a list with photo examples of common commodities we purchase.  This is not an all-inclusive list of items.  The more you seperate your material the more money you will make when you recycle.
